title: The Pillow Fairy
description: Much to Mommy and Daddy's dismay, three-year old Matt has difficulty falling asleep in his own bed. One night the Pillow Fairy comes to visit Matt, and the magical journey begins. First-time author Marcia Gale Riley shares the joy of imagination and wonder that her sons, Justin and Matt, experienced as they faced one of life's first challenges-sleeping in their own beds, all by themselves.The charming illustrations of Joni E. Patterson enhance the innocence and purity of this common childhood experience.
author: Marcia G. Riley
